name: React/Typescript Front-End / NodeJS Mongoose
desc: This template allows you to create full web applications
templateCommandsAfter:
pnpm install &&
rm -f /var/www/wildcards/{{ application.url }}Backend &&
ln -sf {{ fullbuildfolder }}{{ buildFolder }}/back-end/ /var/www/wildcards/{{ application.url }}Backend &&
rm -f /var/www/wildcards/{{ application.url }} &&
ln -sf {{ fullbuildfolder }}{{ buildFolder }}/build /var/www/wildcards/{{ application.url }}
templateCommandsAfterDeploy:
pnpm install && 
pnpm run build &&
ln -sf {{ fullbuildfolder }}{{ buildFolder }}/back-end/ /var/www/wildcards/{{ application.settings.name | friendly | lower }}Backend &&
ln -sf {{ fullbuildfolder }}{{ buildFolder }}/build/ /var/www/wildcards/{{ application.settings.name | friendly | lower }}
